channel.title: CVE Feed for EnterpriseDB -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EnterpriseDB -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4545|2024-05-09T18:12:18.399Z -- enterprisedb -- edb%20postgres%20advanced%20server
item.description: All versions of EnterpriseDB Postgres Advanced Server (EPAS) from 15.0 prior to 15.7.0 and from 16.0 prior to 16.3.0 may allow users using edbldr to bypass role permissions from pg_read_server_files. This could allow low privilege users to read files to which they would not otherwise have access.
